text: Small but impactful 5-floor exhibition on toys from so many perspectives. I appreciate the effort to make the experience interactive and memorable. Highly recommend for anyone who want to heal their inner child. I had so much fun.

The staff are friendly and eager to share information about the collections, enriching your visit with fun facts and stories. The museum also hosts workshops and events, creating a lively community space for toy lovers.

Entrance fee : $30/adult

Tips: Make sure to allocate enough time to explore, as there’s so much to see. Visiting on weekdays can offer a quieter experience, allowing for a leisurely stroll through the exhibits.

The Mint Museum of Toys is more than just a museum; it’s a celebration of imagination and creativity. Whether you’re a toy collector or simply looking for a unique cultural experience in Singapore, this museum is sure to delight!
There’s always a child in all of us, and I had such a great time at the Mint Museum! It felt like a trip back to the good old days.

An amazing experience where we got to connect with old toys and past memories. Really genuine and lovely people and staff that you can interact with and hear so many stories about vintage collections. Amazing building architecture and an all round wonderful experience to just visit and spend time around.
Really enjoyed our time at the Mint Museum, it brought back memories of our younger days. So happy to see toys from all over the world, it’s a great collection that everyone should see!
